trans-unit.source: Represents an immutable regular expression.
The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class represents the .NET Framework's regular expression engine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类表示.NET Framework 的正则表达式引擎。

trans-unit.source: It can be used to quickly parse large amounts of text to find specific character patterns; to extract, edit, replace, or delete text substrings; and to add the extracted strings to a collection to generate a report.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它可以快速分析大量文本以找到特定的字符模式;若要提取、 编辑、 替换或删除文本子字符串;并将提取的字符串添加到集合，以便生成报告。

trans-unit.source: If your primary interest is to validate a string by determining whether it conforms to a particular pattern, you can use the <xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的主要兴趣是通过确定是否符合特定模式验证一个字符串，则可以使用<xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: To use regular expressions, you define the pattern that you want to identify in a text stream by using the syntax documented in [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要使用正则表达式，你定义你想要通过使用中所述的语法来标识在文本流中的模式[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Next, you can optionally instantiate a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，你可以根据需要实例化<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you call a method that performs some operation, such as replacing text that matches the regular expression pattern, or identifying a pattern match.
trans-unit.target: 最后，你调用执行某项操作，如替换与正则表达式模式匹配的文本或标识模式匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: For some common regular expression patterns, see [Regular Expression Examples](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-examples.md).
trans-unit.target: 一些常见的正则表达式模式，请参阅[正则表达式示例](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-examples.md)。

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of online libraries of regular expression patterns, such as the one at [Regular-Expressions.info](http://www.regular-expressions.info/examples.html).
trans-unit.target: 也有大量的正则表达式模式，如在一个联机库[常规 Expressions.info](http://www.regular-expressions.info/examples.html)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the class, see the following sections in this topic:
trans-unit.target: 有关使用类，请参阅本主题中的下列部分：

trans-unit.source: [Regex vs. String Methods](#regex_vs_string)
trans-unit.target: [正则表达式 vs。字符串方法](#regex_vs_string)

trans-unit.source: [Static vs. Instance Methods](#static_vs_instance)
trans-unit.target: [静态 vs。实例方法](#static_vs_instance)

trans-unit.source: [Performing Regular Expression Operations](#regex_ops)
trans-unit.target: [执行正则表达式操作](#regex_ops)

trans-unit.source: [Defining a Time-Out Value](#define_timeout)
trans-unit.target: [定义超时值](#define_timeout)

trans-unit.source: For more information about the regular expression language, see [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) or download and print one of these brochures:
trans-unit.target: 若要详细了解正则表达式语言，请参阅[正则表达式语言 - 快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)，或下载和打印下面的小册子之一：

trans-unit.source: [Quick Reference in Word (.docx) format](http://download.microsoft.com/download/D/2/4/D240EBF6-A9BA-4E4F-A63F-AEB6DA0B921C/Regular%20expressions%20quick%20reference.docx)
trans-unit.target: [快速参考（Word (.docx) 格式）](http://download.microsoft.com/download/D/2/4/D240EBF6-A9BA-4E4F-A63F-AEB6DA0B921C/Regular%20expressions%20quick%20reference.docx)

trans-unit.source: [Quick Reference in PDF (.pdf) format](http://download.microsoft.com/download/D/2/4/D240EBF6-A9BA-4E4F-A63F-AEB6DA0B921C/Regular%20expressions%20quick%20reference.pdf)
trans-unit.target: [快速参考（PDF (.pdf) 格式）](http://download.microsoft.com/download/D/2/4/D240EBF6-A9BA-4E4F-A63F-AEB6DA0B921C/Regular%20expressions%20quick%20reference.pdf)

trans-unit.source: Regex vs. String Methods
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式 vs。字符串方法

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType> class includes several search and comparison methods that you can use to perform pattern matching with text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>类包括几个可用于执行使用文本模式匹配的搜索和比较的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.String.Contains%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.String.EndsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.String.StartsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods determine whether a string instance contains a specified substring; and the <xref:System.String.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.String.IndexOfAny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.String.LastIndexOfAny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods return the starting position of a specified substring in a string.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.String.Contains%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.String.EndsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.String.StartsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法确定的字符串实例是否包含指定的子字符串; 与<xref:System.String.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.String.IndexOfAny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.String.LastIndexOfAny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回一个字符串中指定的子字符串的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the methods of the <xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType> class when you are searching for a specific string.
trans-unit.target: 使用的方法<xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>类搜索特定字符串时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class when you are searching for a specific pattern in a string.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类搜索字符串中的特定模式时。

trans-unit.source: For more information and examples, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: [Back to Remarks](#remarks)
trans-unit.target: [返回到备注](#remarks)

trans-unit.source: Static vs. Instance Methods
trans-unit.target: 静态 vs。实例方法

trans-unit.source: After you define a regular expression pattern, you can provide it to the regular expression engine in either of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 定义正则表达式模式后，可以将其提供给正则表达式引擎为两种方法之一：

trans-unit.source: By instantiating a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object that represents the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 通过实例化<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>表示正则表达式的对象。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you pass the regular expression pattern to a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，你可以传递到正则表达式模式<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is immutable; when you instantiate a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object with a regular expression, that object's regular expression cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象是不可变; 当实例化<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象正则表达式中，对象的正则表达式不能更改。

trans-unit.source: By supplying both the regular expression and the text to search to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供的正则表达式和要搜索的文本`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>方法。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use a regular expression without explicitly creating a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以使用正则表达式而不显式创建<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> pattern identification methods include both static and instance overloads.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>模式标识方法均同时包括静态和实例重载。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression engine must compile a particular pattern before the pattern can be used.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式引擎必须编译的特定模式，然后才能使用模式。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> objects are immutable, this is a one-time procedure that occurs when a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class constructor or a static method is called.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象不可变，这是一个一次性的过程中发生时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>调用类构造函数或静态方法。

trans-unit.source: To eliminate the need to repeatedly compile a single regular expression, the regular expression engine caches the compiled regular expressions used in static method calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要消除重复编译单个正则表达式的需求，正则表达式引擎将缓存静态方法调用中使用的已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: As a result, regular expression pattern-matching methods offer comparable performance for static and instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 因此，正则表达式模式匹配方法提供水平相当的性能，适用于静态和实例方法。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, all compiled regular expressions, whether they were used in instance or static method calls, were cached.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，所有已编译的正则表达式，它们是否已使用实例或静态方法中调用，缓存。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, only regular expressions used in static method calls are cached.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，只有静态方法调用中使用正则表达式进行缓存。

trans-unit.source: However, caching can adversely affect performance in the following two cases:
trans-unit.target: 但是，缓存会产生负面影响以下两种情况中的性能：

trans-unit.source: When you use static method calls with a large number of regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 当有大量的正则表达式使用静态方法调用。

trans-unit.source: By default, the regular expression engine caches the 15 most recently used static regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，正则表达式引擎将缓存 15 个最近使用的静态正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: If your application uses more than 15 static regular expressions, some regular expressions must be recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序使用 15 个以上的静态正则表达式，则必须重新编译某些正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this recompilation, you can increase the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CacheSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止此类重新编译，你可以增加<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CacheSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate new <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> objects with regular expressions that have previously been compiled.
trans-unit.target: 当您实例化新<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>以前编译的正则表达式的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code defines a regular expression to locate duplicated words in a text stream.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码定义在文本流中找到重复的单词的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Although the example uses a single regular expression, it instantiates a new <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object to process each line of text.
trans-unit.target: 虽然本示例使用单个正则表达式，它实例化一个新<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象来处理每行文本。

trans-unit.source: This results in the recompilation of the regular expression with each iteration of the loop.
trans-unit.target: 这会导致与循环的每个迭代重新编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent recompilation, you should instantiate a single <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object that is accessible to all code that requires it, as shown in the following rewritten example.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止重新编译，你应实例化单个<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>中重写下面的示例所示，需要的所有代码访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: [Back to Remarks](#remarks)
trans-unit.target: [返回到备注](#remarks)

trans-unit.source: Performing Regular Expression Operations
trans-unit.target: 执行正则表达式操作

trans-unit.source: Whether you decide to instantiate a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object and call its methods or call static methods, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class offers the following pattern-matching functionality:
trans-unit.target: 你是否决定实例化<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象并调用其方法或调用静态方法，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类提供了以下的模式匹配功能：

trans-unit.source: Validation of a match.
trans-unit.target: 匹配项的验证。

trans-unit.source: You call the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch%2A> method to determine whether a match is present.
trans-unit.target: 你调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch%2A>方法来确定是否存在匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Retrieval of a single match.
trans-unit.target: 检索集合中的单个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: You call the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match> object that represents the first match in a string or in part of a string.
trans-unit.target: 你调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match>表示在一个字符串或字符串的一部分中第一个匹配项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent matches can be retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.NextMatch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 可通过调用检索后续匹配项<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.NextMatch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieval of all matches.
trans-unit.target: 检索集合中的所有匹配项。

trans-unit.source: You call the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> object that represents all the matches found in a string or in part of a string.
trans-unit.target: 你调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>表示在一个字符串或字符串的一部分中找到的所有匹配项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Replacement of matched text.
trans-unit.target: 替换匹配的文本。

trans-unit.source: You call the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%2A> method to replace matched text.
trans-unit.target: 你调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%2A>方法用于替换匹配的文本。

trans-unit.source: The replacement text can also be defined by a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 也可由正则表达式定义的替换文本。

trans-unit.source: In addition, some of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%2A> methods include a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> parameter that enables you to programmatically define the replacement text.
trans-unit.target: 此外，某些<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%2A>方法包括<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>参数，它允许你以编程方式定义的替换文本。

trans-unit.source: Creation of a string array that is formed from parts of an input string.
trans-unit.target: 创建从输入字符串的部分构成的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: You call the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Split%2A> method to split an input string at positions that are defined by the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 你调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Split%2A>拆分输入的字符串由正则表达式定义的位置处的方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition to its pattern-matching methods, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class includes several special-purpose methods:
trans-unit.target: 其模式匹配方法，除了<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类包括了一些特殊用途方法：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape%2A> method escapes any characters that may be interpreted as regular expression operators in a regular expression or input string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape%2A>方法可转义可能被解释为正则表达式或输入的字符串中的正则表达式运算符的任何字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Unescape%2A> method removes these escape characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Unescape%2A>方法中删除这些转义符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method creates an assembly that contains predefined regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法创建该程序集包含预定义的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework contains examples of these special-purpose assemblies in the <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含这些特殊用途中的程序集的示例<xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: [Back to Remarks](#remarks)
trans-unit.target: [返回到备注](#remarks)

trans-unit.source: Defining a Time-Out Value
trans-unit.target: 定义超时值

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework supports a full-featured regular expression language that provides substantial power and flexibility in pattern matching.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 支持一种提供大量强大功能和灵活性在模式匹配的齐全正则表达式语言。

trans-unit.source: However, the power and flexibility come at a cost: the risk of poor performance.
trans-unit.target: 但是的功能和灵活性是需要付出代价： 性能不佳的风险。

trans-unit.source: Regular expressions that perform poorly are surprisingly easy to create.
trans-unit.target: 执行效果不佳的正则表达式是非常简单，若要创建的。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, regular expression operations that rely on excessive backtracking can appear to stop responding when they process text that nearly matches the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，可以显示依赖于过度回溯的约束的正则表达式操作停止响应时在处理与正则表达式模式近似匹配的文本。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the .NET Framework regular expression engine, see [Details of Regular Expression Behavior](~/docs/standard/base-types/details-of-regular-expression-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关.NET Framework 正则表达式引擎的详细信息，请参阅[的正则表达式行为的详细信息](~/docs/standard/base-types/details-of-regular-expression-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about excessive backtracking, see [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关过多使用回溯的详细信息，请参阅[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can define a time-out interval for regular expression matches.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以定义超时间隔的正则表达式匹配项。

trans-unit.source: If the regular expression engine cannot identify a match within this time interval, the matching operation throws a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果正则表达式引擎不能识别在此时间间隔内的匹配项，该匹配操作将引发<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>异常。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, this prevents the regular expression engine from wasting processing power by trying to match text that nearly matches the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这样可以防止正则表达式引擎尝试匹配与正则表达式模式近似匹配的文本而浪费的处理能力。

trans-unit.source: It also could indicate, however, that the timeout interval has been set too low, or that the current machine load has caused an overall degradation in performance.
trans-unit.target: 它还可能表示，但是，该超时间隔设置得过低，或当前机负载已导致性能的整体性能降低。

trans-unit.source: How you handle the exception depends on the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如何处理的异常取决于异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: If the exception occurs because the time-out interval is set too low or because of excessive machine load, you can increase the time-out interval and retry the matching operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为超时间隔设置得太低，则会发生异常，或者由于过多机负载，您可以增大超时间隔，然后重试匹配操作。

trans-unit.source: If the exception occurs because the regular expression relies on excessive backtracking, you can assume that a match does not exist, and, optionally, you can log information that will help you modify the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为正则表达式依赖于过度回溯的约束，则会发生异常，你可以假定匹配项不存在，并且 （可选） 你可以记录将帮助你修改正则表达式模式的信息。

trans-unit.source: You can set a time-out interval by calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> constructor when you instantiate a regular expression object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用设置的超时间隔<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>时实例化正则表达式对象的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For static methods, you can set a time-out interval by calling an overload of a matching method that has a `matchTimeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态方法，你可以通过调用具有匹配方法的重载中设置的超时间隔`matchTimeout`参数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out value explicitly, the default time-out value is determined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置超时值，按如下方式确定的默认超时值：

trans-unit.source: By using the application-wide time-out value, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用应用程序级超时值，如果一个存在。

trans-unit.source: This can be any time-out value that applies to the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is instantiated or the static method call is made.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是适用于的应用程序域中任何超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>实例化对象或调用静态方法。

trans-unit.source: You can set the application-wide time-out value by calling the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to assign the string representation of a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value to the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用设置整个应用程序范围超时值<xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将指定的字符串表示形式<xref:System.TimeSpan>"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"属性值。

trans-unit.source: By using the value <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout>, if no application-wide time-out value has been set.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用的值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout>，如果未不设置任何应用程序级超时值。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you set a time-out value in all regular expression pattern-matching operations.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在所有正则表达式模式匹配操作设置超时值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md)。

trans-unit.source: [Back to Remarks](#remarks)
trans-unit.target: [返回到备注](#remarks)

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a regular expression to check for repeated occurrences of words in a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用正则表达式来检查重复出现的字符串中的单词。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression `\b(?<word>\w+)\s+(\k<word>)\b` can be interpreted as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式`\b(?<word>\w+)\s+(\k<word>)\b`可以解释为下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start the match at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 开始在字边界匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more word characters up to a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个单词字符，最多在单词边界。

trans-unit.source: Name this captured group `word`.
trans-unit.target: 命名此捕获的组`word`。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match the captured group that is named `word`.
trans-unit.target: 与名为捕获的组匹配`word`。

trans-unit.source: Match a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 与字边界匹配。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of a regular expression to check whether a string either represents a currency value or has the correct format to represent a currency value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用正则表达式以检查是否一个字符串，表示货币值或具有表示货币值的正确格式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the regular expression is built dynamically from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties for the user's current culture.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，正则表达式从动态生成<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>用户的当前区域性的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the system's current culture is en-US, the resulting regular expression is `^\s*[\+-]?\s?\$?\s?(\d*\.?\d{2}?){1}$`.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用系统的当前区域性为 EN-US，生成的正则表达式是`^\s*[\+-]?\s?\$?\s?(\d*\.?\d{2}?){1}$`。

trans-unit.source: This regular expression can be interpreted as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中所示，可以解释此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 在该字符串的开头处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of either the positive sign or the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 匹配正号或负号的零个或一个匹配的项。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of the dollar sign.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个匹配项的美元符号。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个小数点符号。

trans-unit.source: Match two decimal digits zero or one time.
trans-unit.target: 匹配两个十进制数字零个或一个时间。

trans-unit.source: Match the pattern of integral and fractional digits separated by a decimal point symbol at least one time.
trans-unit.target: 匹配以下模式： 至少一次隔开小数点符号的整数和小数位数。

trans-unit.source: Match the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符串的末尾。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the regular expression assumes that a valid currency string does not contain group separator symbols, and that it has either no fractional digits or the number of fractional digits defined by the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，正则表达式假定有效货币字符串不包含组分隔符符号，并且它具有任何小数位数或小数位数由当前区域性的定义数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Because the regular expression in this example is built dynamically, we do not know at design time whether the current culture's currency symbol, decimal sign, or positive and negative signs might be misinterpreted by the regular expression engine as regular expression language operators.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中的正则表达式动态生成的因为我们不知道在设计时是否当前区域性的货币符号、 十进制的登录或正值和负值迹象可能被错误解释的正则表达式引擎与正则表达式语言运算符。

trans-unit.source: To prevent any misinterpretation, the example passes each dynamically generated string to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止任何错误解释，该示例，将传递到每个动态生成的字符串<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class is immutable (read-only) and thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />类是不可变 （只读） 和线程安全。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> objects can be created on any thread and shared between threads.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> 可以在任何线程上创建和线程间共享对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Thread Safety](~/docs/standard/base-types/thread-safety-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[的线程安全](~/docs/standard/base-types/thread-safety-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class.
Note that this constructor is protected; it can only be called by classes derived from the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此构造函数都受到保护;仅可以由派生自的类调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern to match.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class for the specified regular expression.
The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see the [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29> constructor with a value of <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None> for the `options` argument.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数是等效于调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29>构造函数的值与<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None>为`options`自变量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is immutable, which means that it can be used only for the match pattern you define when you create it.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象是不可变，这意味着，它可以用于仅在创建它时定义的匹配模式。

trans-unit.source: However, it can be used any number of times without being recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它可以是没有正在重新编译的情况下使用任意次数。

trans-unit.source: This constructor instantiates a regular expression object that attempts a case-sensitive match of any alphabetical characters defined in `pattern`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数实例化尝试定义中的任意字母字符的区分大小写匹配的正则表达式对象`pattern`。

trans-unit.source: For a case-insensitive match, use the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 对于不区分大小写的匹配项，使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use this constructor to instantiate a regular expression that matches any word that begins with the letters "a" or "t".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数来实例化正则表达式相匹配任何单词的开头字母"a"或"t"。

trans-unit.source: Note that the regular expression pattern cannot match the word "The" at the beginning of the text, because comparisons are case-sensitive by default.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，正则表达式模式不匹配的单词"The"开头的文本，因为比较是区分大小写，默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: For an example of case-insensitive comparison, see the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 不区分大小写的比较的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="pattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
This constructor creates a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object that uses the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />使用在其中创建的应用程序域的默认超时值的对象。

trans-unit.source: If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object uses the value <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, which prevents the operation from timing out. The recommended constructor for creating a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object is <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />, which lets you set the time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为应用程序域中，定义一个超时值<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />对象使用的值<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，这会阻止该操作超时。用于创建建议的构造函数<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />对象是<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />，可以在其中你设置的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains a serialized pattern and <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions" /> information.
The destination for this serialization.
(This parameter is not used; specify <see langword="null" />.)
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class by using serialized data.
A regular expression parsing error occurred.
The pattern that <paramref name="info" /> contains is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="info" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions" /> flag.
The regular expression pattern to match.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that modify the regular expression.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class for the specified regular expression, with options that modify the pattern.
The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see the [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is immutable, which means that it can be used only for the match parameters you define when you create it.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象是不可变，这意味着，它可以用于仅在创建它时定义的匹配参数。

trans-unit.source: However, it can be used any number of times without being recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它可以是没有正在重新编译的情况下使用任意次数。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use this constructor to instantiate a regular expression that matches any word that begins with the letters "a" or "t".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数来实例化正则表达式相匹配任何单词的开头字母"a"或"t"。

trans-unit.source: Note that the match collection includes the word "The" that begins the text because the `options` parameter has defined case-insensitive comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，match 集合包括单词"The"的文本开头，因为`options`参数定义了不区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="pattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid flag.
This constructor creates a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object that uses the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />使用在其中创建的应用程序域的默认超时值的对象。

trans-unit.source: If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object uses the value <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, which prevents the operation from timing out. The recommended constructor for creating a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object is <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />, which lets you set the time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为应用程序域中，定义一个超时值<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />对象使用的值<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，这会阻止该操作超时。用于创建建议的构造函数<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />对象是<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />，可以在其中你设置的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern to match.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that modify the regular expression.
A time-out interval, or <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" /> to indicate that the method should not time out.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> class for the specified regular expression, with options that modify the pattern and a value that specifies how long a pattern matching method should attempt a match before it times out.
The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see the [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is immutable, which means that it can be used only for the match pattern that you define when you create it.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象是不可变，这意味着，它可以仅用于进行创建时定义的匹配模式。

trans-unit.source: However, it can be used any number of times without being recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它可以是没有正在重新编译的情况下使用任意次数。

trans-unit.source: The `matchTimeout` parameter specifies how long a pattern-matching method should try to find a match before it times out. If no match is found in that time interval, the pattern-matching method throws a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception.
trans-unit.target: `matchTimeout`参数指定多长时间模式匹配方法应尝试超时之前找到匹配项。如果未找到匹配项是在该时间段内，该模式匹配方法将引发<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>异常。

trans-unit.source: `matchTimeout` overrides any default time-out value defined for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: `matchTimeout` 重写为应用程序域中定义任何默认超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: The instance pattern-matching methods that observe the `matchTimeout` time-out interval include the following:
trans-unit.target: 观察的实例模式匹配方法`matchTimeout`超时间隔包括以下：

trans-unit.source: Setting a time-out interval prevents regular expressions that rely on excessive backtracking from appearing to stop responding when they process input that contains near matches.
trans-unit.target: 将设置的超时间隔可防止依赖于从似乎停止响应时它们处理输入的过度回溯的正则表达式，该字符串包含接近匹配。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md) and [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md)和[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: To set a reasonable time-out interval, consider the following factors:
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的合理的超时间隔，请考虑以下因素：

trans-unit.source: The length and complexity of the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 长度和复杂性的正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Longer and more complex regular expressions require more time than shorter and simpler ones.
trans-unit.target: 长而复杂的正则表达式需要比更简短和简单的更多时间。

trans-unit.source: The expected machine load.
trans-unit.target: 预期的机负载。

trans-unit.source: Processing takes more time on systems that have high CPU and memory utilization.
trans-unit.target: 处理在具有高的 CPU 和内存利用率系统上花费更多时间。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> constructor to instantiate a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object with a time-out value of one second.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>构造函数实例化<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>化超时值为 1 秒的对象。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `(a+)+$`, which matches one or more sequences of one or more "a" characters at the end of a line, is subject to excessive backtracking.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式 `(a+)+$`（与行尾的一个或多个“a”字符的一个或多个序列匹配）受过度回溯的约束。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> is thrown, the example increases the time-out value up to the maximum value of three seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>是引发，该示例会增大到三秒最大值的超时值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it abandons the attempt to match the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它放弃尝试匹配模式。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="pattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="options" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions" /> value.
-or-
<paramref name="matchTimeout" /> is negative, zero, or greater than approximately 24 days.
We recommend that you set the <paramref name="matchTimeout" /> parameter to an appropriate value, such as two seconds.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你设置<paramref name="matchTimeout" />为适当的值，如两秒的参数。

trans-unit.source: If you disable time-outs by specifying <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, the regular expression engine offers slightly better performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过指定禁用超时<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，正则表达式引擎提供略有更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: However, you should disable time-outs only under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 但是，你应禁用超时仅在以下情况：

trans-unit.source: When the input processed by a regular expression is derived from a known and trusted source or consists of static text.
trans-unit.target: 当正则表达式处理的输入派生来自已知且受信任的来源，或包含静态文本。

trans-unit.source: This excludes text that has been dynamically input by users.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括已被动态由用户输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: When the regular expression pattern has been thoroughly tested to ensure that it efficiently handles matches, non-matches, and near matches.
trans-unit.target: 当正则表达式模式经过全面测试以确保它有效地处理匹配，非匹配项，并不久匹配。

trans-unit.source: When the regular expression pattern contains no language elements that are known to cause excessive backtracking when processing a near match.
trans-unit.target: 当正则表达式模式不包含任何已知会引起过多回溯，处理接近的匹配项时的语言元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of entries in the current static cache of compiled regular expressions.
The maximum number of entries in the static cache.
trans-unit.target: 静态缓存中的最大项数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class maintains an internal cache of compiled regular expressions used in static method calls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类维护静态方法调用中使用的已编译正则表达式的内部缓存。

trans-unit.source: If the value specified in a set operation is less than the current cache size, cache entries are discarded until the cache size is equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集运算中指定的值小于当前缓存大小，直到缓存大小是否等于指定的值会丢弃缓存项。

trans-unit.source: By default, the cache holds 15 compiled static regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，缓存包含 15 个已编译的静态正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Your application typically will not have to modify the size of the cache.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序通常将不需要修改缓存大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CacheSize%2A> property only when you want to turn off caching or when you have an unusually large cache.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CacheSize%2A>属性仅当你想要关闭缓存或如果你具有较大的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The value in a set operation is less than zero.
In the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)], regular expressions used in both static and instance method calls were cached.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的.NET Framework [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]、 正则表达式用于静态和实例方法调用已缓存。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)], only regular expressions used in static method calls are cached.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]、 仅 regular 静态方法调用中使用的表达式进行缓存。

trans-unit.source: Used by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object generated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly" /> method.
Gets or sets a dictionary that maps named capturing groups to their index values.
A dictionary that maps named capturing groups to their index values.
trans-unit.target: 将命名捕获组映射到其索引值的字典。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is protected; it can only be accessed from a class derived from the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性受保护;仅可以从类派生自<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类。

trans-unit.source: A set operation attempts to convert the value assigned to the property to a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object; if this conversion fails, it calls the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置操作尝试将分配给属性的值转换<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>对象; 如果此转换失败，则会调用<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CapNames" /> property in a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
Used by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object generated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly" /> method.
Gets or sets a dictionary that maps numbered capturing groups to their index values.
A dictionary that maps numbered capturing groups to their index values.
trans-unit.target: 将编号捕获组映射到其索引值的字典。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is protected; it can only be accessed from a class derived from the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性受保护;仅可以从类派生自<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类。

trans-unit.source: A set operation attempts to convert the value assigned to the property to a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object; if this conversion fails, it calls the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置操作尝试将分配给属性的值转换<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>对象; 如果此转换失败，则会调用<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Caps" /> property in a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
Used by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object generated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly" /> method.
Used by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object generated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly" /> method.
Compiles regular expressions and saves them to disk in a single assembly.
An array that describes the regular expressions to compile.
The file name of the assembly.
Compiles one or more specified <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> objects to a named assembly.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method generates a .NET Framework assembly in which each regular expression defined in the `regexinfos` array is represented by a class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法中定义的每个正则表达式中生成.NET Framework 程序集`regexinfos`由类表示数组。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method is called from a separate application that generates an assembly of compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>从单独的应用程序生成一个程序集的已编译的正则表达式调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Each regular expression included in the assembly has the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 包含在程序集中的每个正则表达式具有以下特征：

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类。

trans-unit.source: It is assigned the fully qualified name that is defined by the `fullnamespace` and `name` parameters of its corresponding <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 它分配由定义的完全限定的名称`fullnamespace`和`name`其相应的参数<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: It has a default (or parameterless) constructor.
trans-unit.target: 它具有一个默认 （或无参数） 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, the code that instantiates and uses the compiled regular expression is found in an assembly or application that is separate from the code that creates the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在一个程序集或独立于创建该程序集的代码的应用程序找到实例化并使用已编译的正则表达式的代码。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an assembly named RegexLib.dll.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建名为 RegexLib.dll 程序集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly includes two compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 程序集包括两个已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The first, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`, matches two identical contiguous words.
trans-unit.target: 首先， `Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`，两个相同的连续单词匹配。

trans-unit.source: The second, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`, checks whether a string has the correct format to be an email address.
trans-unit.target: 第二个， `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`，检查字符串是否具有正确的格式应为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression that checks a string for duplicate words is then instantiated and used by the following example.
trans-unit.target: 然后，检查字符串中的重复单词的正则表达式是实例化，并使用下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: Successful compilation of this second example requires a reference to RegexLib.dll (the assembly created by the first example) to be added to the project.
trans-unit.target: 此第二个示例成功编译要求对 RegexLib.dll （由第一个示例创建程序集） 的引用添加到项目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="assemblyname" /> parameter's <see cref="P:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name" /> property is an empty or null string.
-or-
The regular expression pattern of one or more objects in <paramref name="regexinfos" /> contains invalid syntax.
<paramref name="assemblyname" /> or <paramref name="regexinfos" /> is <see langword="null" />.

If you are developing on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] or its point releases installed, you target [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], and you use the <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly(System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo[],System.Reflection.AssemblyName)" /> method to create an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发的系统上[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]或目标安装其单点发行版， [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，并且你使用<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly(System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo[],System.Reflection.AssemblyName)" />方法来创建该程序集包含已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Trying to use one of the regular expressions in that assembly on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用正则表达式之一在于，其在系统上的程序集[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To work around this problem, you can do either of the following:
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，可执行下列操作之一：

trans-unit.source: Build the assembly that contains the compiled regular expressions on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] instead of later versions installed.
trans-unit.target: 生成包含已编译的正则表达式具有的系统上的程序集[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]而不是安装更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Instead of calling <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly(System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo[],System.Reflection.AssemblyName)" /> and retrieving the compiled regular expression from an assembly, use either static or instance <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> methods with the <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled" /> option when you instantiate a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> object or call a regular expression pattern matching method.
trans-unit.target: 而不是调用<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly(System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo[],System.Reflection.AssemblyName)" />和检索已编译的正则表达式从程序集，使用任一静态或实例<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />方法<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled" />选项在实例化<see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" />对象或调用正则表达式模式匹配方法。

trans-unit.source: An array that describes the regular expressions to compile.
The file name of the assembly.
An array that defines the attributes to apply to the assembly.
Compiles one or more specified <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex" /> objects to a named assembly with the specified attributes.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%5B%5D%29> method generates a .NET Framework assembly in which each regular expression defined in the `regexinfos` array is represented by a class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%5B%5D%29>方法中定义的每个正则表达式中生成.NET Framework 程序集`regexinfos`由类表示数组。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%5B%5D%29> method is called from a separate application that generates an assembly of compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%5B%5D%29>从单独的应用程序生成一个程序集的已编译的正则表达式调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Each regular expression included in the assembly has the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 包含在程序集中的每个正则表达式具有以下特征：

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>类。

trans-unit.source: It is assigned the fully qualified name that is defined by the `fullnamespace` and `name` parameters of its corresponding <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 它分配由定义的完全限定的名称`fullnamespace`和`name`其相应的参数<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: It has a default (or parameterless) constructor.
trans-unit.target: 它具有一个默认 （或无参数） 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, the code that instantiates and uses the compiled regular expression is found in an assembly or application that is separate from the code that creates the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在一个程序集或独立于创建该程序集的代码的应用程序找到实例化并使用已编译的正则表达式的代码。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method generates a .NET Framework assembly from a method call instead of using a particular language's class definition keyword (such as `class` in C# or `Class`…`End Class`
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法而不是使用特定语言的类定义关键字的方法调用从生成.NET Framework 程序集 (如`class`在 C# 或`Class`...`End Class`

trans-unit.source: in Visual Basic), it does not allow .NET Framework attributes to be assigned to the assembly by using the development language's standard attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中)，它不允许.NET Framework 属性分配给程序集，通过开发语言的标准属性语法。

trans-unit.source: The `attributes` parameter provides an alternative method for defining the attributes that apply to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: `attributes`参数提供一种方法来定义应用于程序集的属性。

trans-unit.source: For each attribute that you want to apply to the assembly, do the following:
trans-unit.target: 你想要应用于程序集的每个属性，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Create an array of <xref:System.Type> objects representing the parameter types of the attribute constructor that you want to call.
trans-unit.target: 创建的数组<xref:System.Type>表示你想要调用的特性构造函数的参数类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve a <xref:System.Type> object representing the attribute class that you want to apply to the new assembly.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref:System.Type>表示你想要应用于新的程序集的属性类的对象。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A> method of the attribute <xref:System.Type> object to retrieve a <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object representing the attribute constructor that you want to call.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>方法的属性<xref:System.Type>对象以检索<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>表示你想要调用的特性构造函数的对象。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A> method the array of <xref:System.Type> objects that represents the constructor's parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 传递<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>方法数组的<xref:System.Type>表示构造函数的参数类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Object> array that defines the parameters to pass to the attribute's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Object>定义要传递到该特性的构造函数的参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: Instantiate a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder> object by passing its constructor the <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object retrieved in step 3 and the <xref:System.Object> array created in step 4.
trans-unit.target: 实例化<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>对象向其构造函数传递<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>在步骤 3 中检索对象和<xref:System.Object>步骤 4 中创建的数组。

trans-unit.source: You can then pass an array of these <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder> objects instead of the `attributes` parameter to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以将传递这些数组<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>对象而不是`attributes`参数<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%28System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo%5B%5D%2CSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an assembly named RegexLib.dll and applies the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute> attribute to it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建名为 RegexLib.dll 程序集，并将应用<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute>属性设为它。

trans-unit.source: The assembly includes two compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 程序集包括两个已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The first, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`, matches two identical contiguous words.
trans-unit.target: 首先， `Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`，两个相同的连续单词匹配。

trans-unit.source: The second, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`, checks whether a string has the correct format to be an email address.
trans-unit.target: 第二个， `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`，检查字符串是否具有正确的格式应为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute> attribute has been applied to the assembly by examining its manifest with a reflection utility such as ILDasm.
trans-unit.target: 你可以验证<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyTitleAttribute>属性已通过检查其清单如 ILDasm 的反射实用程序应用于程序集。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression that checks a string for duplicate words is then instantiated and used by the following example.
trans-unit.target: 然后，检查字符串中的重复单词的正则表达式是实例化，并使用下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: Successful compilation of this second example requires a reference to RegexLib.dll (the assembly created by the first example) to be added to the project.
trans-unit.target: 此第二个示例成功编译要求对 RegexLib.dll （由第一个示例创建程序集） 的引用添加到项目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="assemblyname" /> parameter's <see cref="P:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name" /> property is an empty or null string.
-or-
The regular expression pattern of one or more objects in <paramref name="regexinfos" /> contains invalid syntax.
<paramref name="assemblyname" /> or <paramref name="regexinfos" /> is <see langword="null" />.

If you are developing on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] or its point releases installed, you target [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], and you use the <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly(System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo[],System.Reflection.AssemblyName)" /> method to create an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions.
