trans-unit.target: 例如，替换模式`a*${test}b`插入字符串"*"跟由匹配的子字符串`test`捕获组，如果有的话后, 跟字符串"b"。

trans-unit.source: The * character is not recognized as a metacharacter within a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: * 字符不被识别为元字符在替换模式中。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions are the only regular expression language elements that are recognized in a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 替换是替换模式中识别的唯一的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: All other regular expression language elements, including [character escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md), are allowed in regular expression patterns only and are not recognized in replacement patterns.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他正则表达式语言元素，包括[字符转义](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)、 在仅正则表达式模式中允许和不在替换模式中识别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的超时间隔将引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作超过应用程序域建立在其中任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown
trans-unit.target: 如果在中定义无超时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a regular expression, `\s+`, that matches one or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义正则表达式， `\s+`，与一个或多个空白字符相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string, " ", replaces them with a single space character.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串中，""，将它们替换为单个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a regular expression, `(\p{Sc}\s?)?(\d+\.?((?<=\.)\d+)?)(?(1)|\s?\p{Sc})?`, and a replacement pattern, `$2`, that removes either a leading or a trailing currency symbol from a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义正则表达式， `(\p{Sc}\s?)?(\d+\.?((?<=\.)\d+)?)(?(1)|\s?\p{Sc})?`，和一个替换模式， `$2`，，从中移除一个前导或尾随的货币符号的数字值。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is interpreted as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式可以解释为下表中所示内容。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match a currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 匹配货币符号。

trans-unit.source: `{Sc}` denotes any character that is a member of the Unicode Symbol, Currency category.
trans-unit.target: `{Sc}` 表示任何字符的 Unicode 符号、 货币类别的成员。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of the combination of a currency symbol followed by zero or one white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个匹配项的货币符号后跟零个或一个空白字符的组合。

trans-unit.source: This is the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of a period (used as a decimal separator character).
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个匹配项的句点 （用作小数分隔符字符）。

trans-unit.source: If a period is the previous character, match one or more decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 如果一段时间是前一个字符，则匹配一个或多个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: This pattern can be matched either zero or one time.
trans-unit.target: 此模式可以匹配零个或一个时间。

trans-unit.source: Match the pattern of one or more decimal digits followed by an optional period and additional decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个十进制数字，后面再跟一个可选的句点和其他十进制数字的模式。

trans-unit.source: This is the second capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第二个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method replaces the entire match with the value of this captured group.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法会整个匹配项替换为此捕获组的值。

trans-unit.source: If the first captured group exists, match an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个捕获的组存在，则匹配空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, match zero or one white-space character followed by a currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 否则，匹配零个或一个空白字符，再后跟货币符号。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="replacement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
A custom method that examines each match and returns either the original matched string or a replacement string.
In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a specified regular expression with a string returned by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator" /> delegate.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that a replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If the regular expression pattern is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is useful for replacing a regular expression match if any of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可用于替换正则表达式匹配，如果以下任何条件为 true:

trans-unit.source: The replacement string cannot readily be specified by a regular expression replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式替换模式中不能轻松地指定替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from some processing done on the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 通过在匹配的字符串上完成某些处理生成的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from conditional processing.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串的结果从有条件处理。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing each <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match> object in the returned <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection> collection to the `evaluator` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传递每个<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match>在返回的对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection>集合到`evaluator`委托。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is the pattern defined by the constructor for the current <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式是当前的构造函数定义的模式<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `evaluator` parameter is the delegate for a custom method that you define and that examines each match.
trans-unit.target: `evaluator`参数是你定义的自定义方法的委托，用于检查每个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The custom method must have the following signature to match the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的方法必须具有以下签名以匹配<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>委托。

trans-unit.source: Your custom method returns a string that replaces the matched input.
trans-unit.target: 你自定义的方法返回替换匹配的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的超时间隔将引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作超过应用程序域建立在其中任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown
trans-unit.target: 如果在中定义无超时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays an original string, matches each word in the original string, converts the first character of each match to uppercase, then displays the converted string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示原始字符串、 匹配原始字符串中的每个单词、 将转换后的字符串转换为大写，然后显示每个匹配项的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="evaluator" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
The replacement string.
The maximum number of times the replacement can occur.
In a specified input string, replaces a specified maximum number of strings that match a regular expression pattern with a specified replacement string.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that the replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If the regular expression pattern is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.
The search for matches starts at the beginning of the `input` string.
trans-unit.target: 开头开始搜索匹配项`input`字符串。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is the pattern that is defined by the constructor for the current <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式是由当前的构造函数定义的模式<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: If `count` is negative, replacements continue to the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`为负，替换继续到字符串的末尾。

trans-unit.source: If `count` exceeds the number of matches, all matches are replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`超过了匹配项的数目，则替换所有匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The `replacement` parameter specifies the string that is to replace the first `count` matches in `input`.
trans-unit.target: `replacement`参数指定的字符串，用于替换第一个`count`中匹配`input`。

trans-unit.source: `replacement` can consist of any combination of literal text and [substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: `replacement` 可以包含文字文本的任意组合和[替换](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the replacement pattern `a*${test}b` inserts the string "a*" followed by the substring that is matched by the `test` capturing group, if any, followed by the string "b".
trans-unit.target: 例如，替换模式`a*${test}b`插入字符串"*"跟由匹配的子字符串`test`捕获组，如果有的话后, 跟字符串"b"。

trans-unit.source: The * character is not recognized as a metacharacter within a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: * 字符不被识别为元字符在替换模式中。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions are the only regular expression language elements that are recognized in a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 替换是替换模式中识别的唯一的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: All other regular expression language elements, including [character escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md), are allowed in regular expression patterns only and are not recognized in replacement patterns.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他正则表达式语言元素，包括[字符转义](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)、 在仅正则表达式模式中允许和不在替换模式中识别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的超时间隔将引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作超过应用程序域建立在其中任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown
trans-unit.target: 如果在中定义无超时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example replaces the first five occurrences of duplicated characters with a single character.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将重复字符的前五个匹配项替换为单个字符。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1` matches consecutive occurrences of a single character and assigns the first occurrence to the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式`(\w)\1`匹配的单个字符的连续匹配项并将第一个匹配项分配给第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: The replacement pattern `$1` replaces the entire match with the first captured group.
trans-unit.target: 替换模式`$1`整个匹配项替换第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="replacement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
The regular expression pattern to match.
The replacement string.
In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a specified regular expression with a specified replacement string.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that the replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If <paramref name="pattern" /> is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The static `Replace` methods are equivalent to constructing a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object with the specified regular expression pattern and calling the instance method `Replace`.
trans-unit.target: 静态`Replace`方法是构造等效<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象使用指定的正则表达式模式，并调用实例方法`Replace`。

trans-unit.source: The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: The search for matches starts at the beginning of the `input` string.
trans-unit.target: 开头开始搜索匹配项`input`字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `replacement` parameter specifies the string that is to replace each match in `input`.
trans-unit.target: `replacement`参数指定是替换中的每个匹配项的字符串`input`。

trans-unit.source: `replacement` can consist of any combination of literal text and [substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: `replacement` 可以包含文字文本的任意组合和[替换](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the replacement pattern `a*${test}b` inserts the string "a*" followed by the substring that is matched by the `test` capturing group, if any, followed by the string "b".
trans-unit.target: 例如，替换模式`a*${test}b`插入字符串"*"跟由匹配的子字符串`test`捕获组，如果有的话后, 跟字符串"b"。

trans-unit.source: The * character is not recognized as a metacharacter within a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: * 字符不被识别为元字符在替换模式中。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions are the only regular expression language elements that are recognized in a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 替换是替换模式中识别的唯一的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: All other regular expression language elements, including [character escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md), are allowed in regular expression patterns only and are not recognized in replacement patterns.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他正则表达式语言元素，包括[字符转义](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)、 在仅正则表达式模式中允许和不在替换模式中识别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified for the application domain in which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的方法称为应用程序域的超时间隔将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有超时设置定义在应用程序域的属性中，或者如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a regular expression, `\s+`, that matches one or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义正则表达式， `\s+`，与一个或多个空白字符相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string, " ", replaces them with a single space character.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串中，""，将它们替换为单个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method to replace the local machine and drive names in a UNC path with a local file path.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法将替换为本地文件路径的 UNC 路径中的本地计算机和驱动器名称。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression uses the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to include the name of the local computer, and the <xref:System.Environment.GetLogicalDrives%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to include the names of the logical drives.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式使用<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以包含本地计算机的名称和<xref:System.Environment.GetLogicalDrives%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将包含的逻辑驱动器的名称。

trans-unit.source: To run the example successfully, you should replace the literal string "MyMachine" with your local machine name.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功运行该示例，应将文本字符串"MyMachine"替换你本地计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined by the following expression:
trans-unit.target: 以下表达式所定义的正则表达式模式：

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match two consecutive backslash (`\`) characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配两个连续反斜杠 (`\`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: Because the backslash character is interpreted as the escape character, each backslash must be escaped with another backslash.
trans-unit.target: 反斜杠字符解释为转义符，因为每个反斜杠必须使用另一个反斜杠进行转义。

trans-unit.source: Perform a case-insensitive match of the string that is returned by the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 执行返回的字符串不区分大小写的匹配<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Match the period (`.`) character followed by one or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配句号 (`.`) 字符后跟一个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: This match can occur zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: 此匹配可以出现零次或多次。

trans-unit.source: The matched subexpression is not captured.
trans-unit.target: 不捕获匹配的子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match a backslash (`\`) character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个反斜杠 (`\`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: Perform a case-insensitive match of the character class that consists of the individual drive lettters.
trans-unit.target: 执行不区分大小写的匹配项，包含单个驱动器字母的字符类。

trans-unit.source: This match is the first captured subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 此匹配项是第一个捕获子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match the literal dollar sign (`$`) character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配文本的美元符号 (`$`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: The replacement pattern `$1` replaces the entire match with the first captured subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 替换模式`$1`用第一个捕获子表达式替换整个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: That is, it replaces the UNC machine and drive name with the drive letter.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它可以用的驱动器号替换 UNC 机和驱动器名称。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="input" />, <paramref name="pattern" />, or <paramref name="replacement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
This method times out after an interval that is equal to the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于调用它的应用程序域的默认超时值的时间间隔后超时。

trans-unit.source: If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the value <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, which prevents the method from timing out, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为应用程序域，值定义超时值<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，它防止超时，方法使用。

trans-unit.source: The recommended static method for replacing a pattern match is <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />, which lets you set the time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 建议的静态方法，用于更换有模式匹配是<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />，可以在其中你设置的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The string to search for a match.
The regular expression pattern to match.
A custom method that examines each match and returns either the original matched string or a replacement string.
In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a specified regular expression with a string returned by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator" /> delegate.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that a replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If <paramref name="pattern" /> is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is useful for replacing a regular expression match if any of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可用于替换正则表达式匹配，如果以下任何条件为 true:

trans-unit.source: The replacement string cannot readily be specified by a regular expression replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式替换模式中不能轻松地指定替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from some processing done on the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 通过在匹配的字符串上完成某些处理生成的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from conditional processing.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串的结果从有条件处理。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing each <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match> object in the returned <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection> collection to the `evaluator` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传递每个<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match>在返回的对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection>集合到`evaluator`委托。

trans-unit.source: The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `evaluator` parameter is the delegate for a custom method that you define and that examines each match.
trans-unit.target: `evaluator`参数是你定义的自定义方法的委托，用于检查每个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The custom method must have the following signature to match the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的方法必须具有以下签名以匹配<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>委托。

trans-unit.source: Your custom method returns a string that replaces the matched input.
trans-unit.target: 你自定义的方法返回替换匹配的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified for the application domain in which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的方法称为应用程序域的超时间隔将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有超时设置定义在应用程序域的属性中，或者如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a regular expression to extract the individual words from a string, and then uses a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate to call a method named `WordScramble` that scrambles the individual letters in the word.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用正则表达式，从字符串提取各个单词，然后使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>要调用一个名为方法委托`WordScramble`打乱单词中的单个字母。

trans-unit.source: To do this, the `WordScramble` method creates an array that contains the characters in the match.
trans-unit.target: 若要这样做，`WordScramble`方法创建一个数组，包含匹配项中的字符。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a parallel array that it populates with random floating-point numbers.
trans-unit.target: 它还用随机浮点数将创建它填充的并行数组。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are sorted by calling the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and the sorted array is provided as an argument to a <xref:System.String> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这些数组进行排序通过调用<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并已排序的数组的自变量作为提供<xref:System.String>类构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This newly created string is then returned by the `WordScramble` method.
trans-unit.target: 然后返回此新创建的字符串`WordScramble`方法。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `\w+` matches one or more word characters; the regular expression engine will continue to add characters to the match until it encounters a non-word character, such as a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式`\w+`匹配一个或多个单词字符; 正则表达式引擎将继续添加字符到匹配项，直到它遇到非单词字符，例如空白字符。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="input" />, <paramref name="pattern" />, or <paramref name="evaluator" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
This method times out after an interval that is equal to the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于调用它的应用程序域的默认超时值的时间间隔后超时。

trans-unit.source: If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the value <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, which prevents the method from timing out, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为应用程序域，值定义超时值<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，它防止超时，方法使用。

trans-unit.source: The recommended static method for evaluating and replacing a pattern match is <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />, which lets you set the time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 建议的静态方法用于评估和替换模式匹配是<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />，可以在其中你设置的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The string to search for a match.
A custom method that examines each match and returns either the original matched string or a replacement string.
The maximum number of times the replacement will occur.

In a specified input string, replaces a specified maximum number of strings that match a regular expression pattern with a string returned by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator" /> delegate.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that a replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If the regular expression pattern is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is useful for replacing a regular expression match if any of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可用于替换正则表达式匹配，如果以下任何条件为 true:

trans-unit.source: The replacement string cannot readily be specified by a regular expression replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式替换模式中不能轻松地指定替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from some processing done on the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 通过在匹配的字符串上完成某些处理生成的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from conditional processing.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串的结果从有条件处理。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing the first `count`<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match> objects in the returned <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection> collection to the `evaluator` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传递第一个`count`<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match>中返回的对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection>集合到`evaluator`委托。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is the pattern defined by the constructor for the current <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式是当前的构造函数定义的模式<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `evaluator` parameter is the delegate for a custom method that you define and that examines each match.
trans-unit.target: `evaluator`参数是你定义的自定义方法的委托，用于检查每个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The custom method must have the following signature to match the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的方法必须具有以下签名以匹配<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>委托。

trans-unit.source: Your custom method returns a string that replaces the matched input.
trans-unit.target: 你自定义的方法返回替换匹配的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的超时间隔将引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作超过应用程序域建立在其中任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown
trans-unit.target: 如果在中定义无超时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a regular expression to deliberately misspell half of the words in a list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用正则表达式来有意拼错一半的单词列表中。

trans-unit.source: It uses the regular expression `\w*(ie|ei)\w*` to match words that include the characters "ie" or "ei".
trans-unit.target: 它使用正则表达式`\w*(ie|ei)\w*`与包含字符"ie"或"ei"的单词匹配。

trans-unit.source: It passes the first half of the matching words to the `ReverseLetter` method, which, in turn, uses the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29> method to reverse "i" and "e" in the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 通过第一个一半匹配字来`ReverseLetter`方法，反过来，使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29>方法，以撤消"i"和"e"中匹配的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The remaining words remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 其他单词保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression `\w*(ie|ei)\w*` is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式 `\w*(ie|ei)\w*` 的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: Match either "ie" or "ei".
trans-unit.target: 匹配"ie"或"ei"。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `([ie])([ie])` in the `ReverseLetter` method matches the first "i" or "e" in the diphthong "ie" or "ei" and assigns the letter to the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式`([ie])([ie])`中`ReverseLetter`方法中 diphthong"ie"或"ei"匹配的第一个"i"或"e"，并将字母分配给第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: It matches the second "i" or "e" and assigns the letter to the second capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 它将匹配的第二个"i"或"e"，并将号分配给第二个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: The two characters are then reversed by calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method with the replacement pattern `$2$1`.
trans-unit.target: 两个字符然后通过调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>使用替换模式的方法`$2$1`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="evaluator" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
The replacement string.
Maximum number of times the replacement can occur.
The character position in the input string where the search begins.
In a specified input substring, replaces a specified maximum number of strings that match a regular expression pattern with a specified replacement string.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that the replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If the regular expression pattern is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.
The search for matches starts in the `input` string at the position specified by the `startat` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 开始搜索匹配项`input`字符串中指定的位置`startat`参数。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is the pattern defined by the constructor for the current <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式是当前的构造函数定义的模式<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: If `count` is negative, replacements continue to the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`为负，替换继续到字符串的末尾。

trans-unit.source: If `count` exceeds the number of matches, all matches are replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`超过了匹配项的数目，则替换所有匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The `replacement` parameter specifies the string that is to replace each match in `input`.
trans-unit.target: `replacement`参数指定是替换中的每个匹配项的字符串`input`。

trans-unit.source: `replacement` can consist of any combination of literal text and [substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: `replacement` 可以包含文字文本的任意组合和[替换](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the replacement pattern `a*${test}b` inserts the string "a*" followed by the substring that is matched by the `test` capturing group, if any, followed by the string "b".
trans-unit.target: 例如，替换模式`a*${test}b`插入字符串"*"跟由匹配的子字符串`test`捕获组，如果有的话后, 跟字符串"b"。

trans-unit.source: The * character is not recognized as a metacharacter within a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: * 字符不被识别为元字符在替换模式中。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions are the only regular expression language elements that are recognized in a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 替换是替换模式中识别的唯一的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: All other regular expression language elements, including [character escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md), are allowed in regular expression patterns only and are not recognized in replacement patterns.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他正则表达式语言元素，包括[字符转义](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)、 在仅正则表达式模式中允许和不在替换模式中识别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的超时间隔将引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作超过应用程序域建立在其中任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown
trans-unit.target: 如果在中定义无超时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example double-spaces all but the first line of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例 double-spaces 除字符串的第一行。

trans-unit.source: It defines a regular expression pattern, `^.*$`, that matches a line of text, calls the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match%28System.String%29> method to match the first line of the string, and uses the `Match.Index` and `Match.Count` properties to determine the starting position of the second line.
trans-unit.target: 它定义正则表达式模式， `^.*$`，可匹配的文本，调用一行<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match%28System.String%29>方法可以进行匹配的字符串，并使用的第一行`Match.Index`和`Match.Count`属性来确定第二个的起始位置行。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `^.*$` is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式 `^.*$` 的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match the start of a line.
trans-unit.target: 匹配行的开头。

trans-unit.source: (Note that the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object was instantiated by using the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline?displayProperty=nameWithType> option; otherwise, this character class would only match the beginning of the input string.)
trans-unit.target: (请注意，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>通过实例化对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline?displayProperty=nameWithType>选项; 否则，此字符类将仅匹配输入字符串的开头。)

trans-unit.source: Match any character zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: 零次或多次匹配任何字符。

trans-unit.source: Match the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 匹配行的末尾。

trans-unit.source: (Note that the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object was instantiated by using the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline?displayProperty=nameWithType> option; otherwise, this character class would only match the beginning of the input string.)
trans-unit.target: (请注意，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>通过实例化对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline?displayProperty=nameWithType>选项; 否则，此字符类将仅匹配输入字符串的开头。)

trans-unit.source: The replacement string (`vbCrLf + "$&"` in Visual Basic, `"\n$&"` in C#) adds a new line before the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串 (`vbCrLf + "$&"`在 Visual Basic 中， `"\n$&"` C# 中) 添加一个新行之前匹配的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Note that `\n` in the C# example is interpreted as the newline character by the C# compiler; it does not represent a regular expression character escape.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，`\n`在 C# 示例将解释为换行字符由 C# 编译器; 它不表示正则表达式字符转义。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="replacement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="startat" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="input" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
The regular expression pattern to match.
The replacement string.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that provide options for matching.
In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a specified regular expression with a specified replacement string.
Specified options modify the matching operation.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that the replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If <paramref name="pattern" /> is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The static `Replace` methods are equivalent to constructing a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object with the specified regular expression pattern and calling the instance method `Replace`.
trans-unit.target: 静态`Replace`方法是构造等效<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象使用指定的正则表达式模式，并调用实例方法`Replace`。

trans-unit.source: The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft> for the `options` parameter, the search for matches begins at the end of the input string and moves left; otherwise, the search begins at the start of the input string and moves right.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft>为`options`参数，在输入字符串末尾开始和向左移动的匹配项的搜索; 否则为搜索输入字符串的开头开始，并向右移动。

trans-unit.source: The `replacement` parameter specifies the string that is to replace each match in `input`.
trans-unit.target: `replacement`参数指定是替换中的每个匹配项的字符串`input`。

trans-unit.source: `replacement` can consist of any combination of literal text and [substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: `replacement` 可以包含文字文本的任意组合和[替换](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the replacement pattern `a*${test}b` inserts the string "a*" followed by the substring that is matched by the `test` capturing group, if any, followed by the string "b".
trans-unit.target: 例如，替换模式`a*${test}b`插入字符串"*"跟由匹配的子字符串`test`捕获组，如果有的话后, 跟字符串"b"。

trans-unit.source: The * character is not recognized as a metacharacter within a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: * 字符不被识别为元字符在替换模式中。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions are the only regular expression language elements that are recognized in a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 替换是替换模式中识别的唯一的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: All other regular expression language elements, including [character escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md), are allowed in regular expression patterns only and are not recognized in replacement patterns.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他正则表达式语言元素，包括[字符转义](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)、 在仅正则表达式模式中允许和不在替换模式中识别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified for the application domain in which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的方法称为应用程序域的超时间隔将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有超时设置定义在应用程序域的属性中，或者如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29> method to replace the local machine and drive names in a UNC path with a local file path.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29>方法将替换为本地文件路径的 UNC 路径中的本地计算机和驱动器名称。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression uses the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to include the name of the local computer, and the <xref:System.Environment.GetLogicalDrives%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to include the names of the logical drives.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式使用<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以包含本地计算机的名称和<xref:System.Environment.GetLogicalDrives%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将包含的逻辑驱动器的名称。

trans-unit.source: All regular expression string comparisons are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 所有正则表达式字符串比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: To run the example successfully, you should replace the literal string "MyMachine" with your local machine name.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功运行该示例，应将文本字符串"MyMachine"替换你本地计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined by the following expression:
trans-unit.target: 以下表达式所定义的正则表达式模式：

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match two consecutive backslash (`\`) characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配两个连续反斜杠 (`\`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: Because the backslash character is interpreted as the escape character, each backslash must be escaped with another backslash.
trans-unit.target: 反斜杠字符解释为转义符，因为每个反斜杠必须使用另一个反斜杠进行转义。

trans-unit.source: Match the string that is returned by the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串匹配<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Match the period (`.`) character followed by one or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配句号 (`.`) 字符后跟一个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: This match can occur zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: 此匹配可以出现零次或多次。

trans-unit.source: The matched subexpression is not captured.
trans-unit.target: 不捕获匹配的子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match a backslash (`\`) character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个反斜杠 (`\`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: Match the character class that consists of the individual drive letters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配单个驱动器字母组成的字符类。

trans-unit.source: This match is the first captured subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 此匹配项是第一个捕获子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match the literal dollar sign (`$`) character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配文本的美元符号 (`$`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: The replacement pattern `$1` replaces the entire match with the first captured subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 替换模式`$1`用第一个捕获子表达式替换整个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: That is, it replaces the UNC machine and drive name with the drive letter.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它可以用的驱动器号替换 UNC 机和驱动器名称。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="input" />, <paramref name="pattern" />, or <paramref name="replacement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="options" /> is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions" /> values.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
This method times out after an interval that is equal to the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于调用它的应用程序域的默认超时值的时间间隔后超时。

trans-unit.source: If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the value <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, which prevents the method from timing out, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为应用程序域，值定义超时值<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，它防止超时，方法使用。

trans-unit.source: The recommended static method for replacing a pattern match is <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />, which lets you set the time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 建议的静态方法，用于更换有模式匹配是<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.TimeSpan)" />，可以在其中你设置的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The string to search for a match.
The regular expression pattern to match.
A custom method that examines each match and returns either the original matched string or a replacement string.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that provide options for matching.
In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a specified regular expression with a string returned by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator" /> delegate.
Specified options modify the matching operation.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that a replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If <paramref name="pattern" /> is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is useful for replacing a regular expression match in if any of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可用于替换中的正则表达式匹配项，如果以下任何条件为 true:

trans-unit.source: The replacement string cannot readily be specified by a regular expression replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式替换模式中不能轻松地指定替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from some processing done on the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 通过在匹配的字符串上完成某些处理生成的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from conditional processing.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串的结果从有条件处理。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing each <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match> object in the returned <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection> collection to the `evaluator` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传递每个<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match>在返回的对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection>集合到`evaluator`委托。

trans-unit.source: The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `evaluator` parameter is the delegate for a custom method that you define and that examines each match.
trans-unit.target: `evaluator`参数是你定义的自定义方法的委托，用于检查每个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The custom method must have the following signature to match the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的方法必须具有以下签名以匹配<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>委托。

trans-unit.source: Your custom method returns a string that replaces the matched input.
trans-unit.target: 你自定义的方法返回替换匹配的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft> for the `options` parameter, the search for matches begins at the end of the input string and moves left; otherwise, the search begins at the start of the input string and moves right.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft>为`options`参数，在输入字符串末尾开始和向左移动的匹配项的搜索; 否则为搜索输入字符串的开头开始，并向右移动。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified for the application domain in which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的方法称为应用程序域的超时间隔将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有超时设置定义在应用程序域的属性中，或者如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a regular expression to extract the individual words from a string, and then uses a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate to call a method named `WordScramble` that scrambles the individual letters in the word.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用正则表达式，从字符串提取各个单词，然后使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>要调用一个名为方法委托`WordScramble`打乱单词中的单个字母。

trans-unit.source: To do this, the `WordScramble` method creates an array that contains the characters in the match.
trans-unit.target: 若要这样做，`WordScramble`方法创建一个数组，包含匹配项中的字符。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a parallel array that it populates with random floating-point numbers.
trans-unit.target: 它还用随机浮点数将创建它填充的并行数组。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are sorted by calling the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and the sorted array is provided as an argument to a <xref:System.String> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这些数组进行排序通过调用<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并已排序的数组的自变量作为提供<xref:System.String>类构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This newly created string is then returned by the `WordScramble` method.
trans-unit.target: 然后返回此新创建的字符串`WordScramble`方法。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `\w+` matches one or more word characters; the regular expression engine will continue to add characters to the match until it encounters a non-word character, such as a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式`\w+`匹配一个或多个单词字符; 正则表达式引擎将继续添加字符到匹配项，直到它遇到非单词字符，例如空白字符。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29> method includes the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace?displayProperty=nameWithType> option so that the comment in the regular expression pattern `\w+ # Matches all the characters in a word.` is ignored by the regular expression engine.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%29>方法包括<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace?displayProperty=nameWithType>选项，以便在正则表达式模式中的注释`\w+ # Matches all the characters in a word.`正则表达式引擎将忽略。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression parsing error occurred.
<paramref name="input" />, <paramref name="pattern" />, or <paramref name="evaluator" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="options" /> is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions" /> values.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
A custom method that examines each match and returns either the original matched string or a replacement string.
The maximum number of times the replacement will occur.
The character position in the input string where the search begins.

In a specified input substring, replaces a specified maximum number of strings that match a regular expression pattern with a string returned by a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator" /> delegate.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that a replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If the regular expression pattern is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is useful for replacing a regular expression match if any of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可用于替换正则表达式匹配，如果以下任何条件为 true:

trans-unit.source: The replacement string cannot readily be specified by a regular expression replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式替换模式中不能轻松地指定替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from some processing done on the matched string.
trans-unit.target: 通过在匹配的字符串上完成某些处理生成的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string results from conditional processing.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串的结果从有条件处理。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing the first `count`<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match> objects in the returned <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection> collection to the `evaluator` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传递第一个`count`<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match>中返回的对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection>集合到`evaluator`委托。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is the pattern defined by the constructor for the current <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式是当前的构造函数定义的模式<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `evaluator` parameter is the delegate for a custom method that you define and that examines each match.
trans-unit.target: `evaluator`参数是你定义的自定义方法的委托，用于检查每个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The custom method must have the following signature to match the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的方法必须具有以下签名以匹配<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator>委托。

trans-unit.source: Your custom method returns a string that replaces the matched input.
trans-unit.target: 你自定义的方法返回替换匹配的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown if the execution time of the replacement operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>如果替换操作的执行时间超出指定的超时间隔将引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作超过应用程序域建立在其中任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: If no time-out is defined in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, no exception is thrown
trans-unit.target: 如果在中定义无超时<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不会引发异常

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="evaluator" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="startat" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="input" />.
A time-out occurred.
For more information about time-outs, see the Remarks section.
The string to search for a match.
The regular expression pattern to match.
The replacement string.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that provide options for matching.
A time-out interval, or <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" /> to indicate that the method should not time out.
In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a specified regular expression with a specified replacement string.
Additional parameters specify options that modify the matching operation and a time-out interval if no match is found.
A new string that is identical to the input string, except that the replacement string takes the place of each matched string.
If <paramref name="pattern" /> is not matched in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

The static `Replace` methods are equivalent to constructing a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex> object with the specified regular expression pattern and calling the instance method `Replace`.
trans-unit.target: 静态`Replace`方法是构造等效<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>对象使用指定的正则表达式模式，并调用实例方法`Replace`。

trans-unit.source: The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match.
trans-unit.target: `pattern`参数包含以符号方式描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)和[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft> for the `options` parameter, the search for matches begins at the end of the input string and moves left; otherwise, the search begins at the start of the input string and moves right.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft>为`options`参数，在输入字符串末尾开始和向左移动的匹配项的搜索; 否则为搜索输入字符串的开头开始，并向右移动。

trans-unit.source: The `replacement` parameter specifies the string that is to replace each match in `input`.
trans-unit.target: `replacement`参数指定是替换中的每个匹配项的字符串`input`。

trans-unit.source: `replacement` can consist of any combination of literal text and [substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: `replacement` 可以包含文字文本的任意组合和[替换](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the replacement pattern `a*${test}b` inserts the string "a*" followed by the substring that is matched by the `test` capturing group, if any, followed by the string "b".
trans-unit.target: 例如，替换模式`a*${test}b`插入字符串"*"跟由匹配的子字符串`test`捕获组，如果有的话后, 跟字符串"b"。

trans-unit.source: The * character is not recognized as a metacharacter within a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: * 字符不被识别为元字符在替换模式中。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions are the only regular expression language elements that are recognized in a replacement pattern.
trans-unit.target: 替换是替换模式中识别的唯一的正则表达式语言元素。

trans-unit.source: All other regular expression language elements, including [character escapes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md), are allowed in regular expression patterns only and are not recognized in replacement patterns.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他正则表达式语言元素，包括[字符转义](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-escapes-in-regular-expressions.md)、 在仅正则表达式模式中允许和不在替换模式中识别。

trans-unit.source: The `matchTimeout` parameter specifies how long a pattern matching method should try to find a match before it times out. Setting a time-out interval prevents regular expressions that rely on excessive backtracking from appearing to stop responding when they process input that contains near matches.
trans-unit.target: `matchTimeout`参数指定如何长时间模式匹配方法应尝试超时之前找到匹配项。将设置的超时间隔可防止依赖于从似乎停止响应时它们处理输入的过度回溯的正则表达式，该字符串包含接近匹配。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md) and [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md)和[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。

trans-unit.source: If no match is found in that time interval, the method throws a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到匹配项是在该时间段内，该方法将引发<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>异常。

trans-unit.source: `matchTimeout` overrides any default time-out value defined for the application domain in which the method executes.
trans-unit.target: `matchTimeout` 重写任何应用程序域执行此方法定义的默认超时值。

trans-unit.source: Because the method returns `input` unchanged if there is no match, you can use the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the method has made any replacements to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 因为该方法返回`input`如果没有匹配项，保持不变，你可以使用<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来确定该方法是否已发生与输入字符串的任何替换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> method to replace the local machine and drive names in a UNC path with a local file path.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>方法将替换为本地文件路径的 UNC 路径中的本地计算机和驱动器名称。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression uses the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to include the name of the local computer and the <xref:System.Environment.GetLogicalDrives%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to include the names of the logical drives.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式使用<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以包含本地计算机的名称和<xref:System.Environment.GetLogicalDrives%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将包含的逻辑驱动器的名称。

trans-unit.source: All regular expression string comparisons are case-insensitive, and any single replacement operation times out if a match cannot be found in 0.5 second.
trans-unit.target: 所有正则表达式字符串比较是区分大小写，并在 0.5 秒中找不到匹配项，任何单个替换操作将会超时。

trans-unit.source: To run the example successfully, you should replace the literal string "MyMachine" with your local machine name.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功运行该示例，应将文本字符串"MyMachine"替换你本地计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined by the following expression:
trans-unit.target: 以下表达式所定义的正则表达式模式：

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match two consecutive backslash (`\`) characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配两个连续反斜杠 (`\`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: Because the backslash character is interpreted as the escape character, each backslash must be escaped with another backslash.
trans-unit.target: 反斜杠字符解释为转义符，因为每个反斜杠必须使用另一个反斜杠进行转义。

trans-unit.source: Match the string that is returned by the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串匹配<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Match the period (`.`) character followed by one or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配句号 (`.`) 字符后跟一个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: This match can occur zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: 此匹配可以出现零次或多次。

trans-unit.source: The matched subexpression is not captured.
trans-unit.target: 不捕获匹配的子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match a backslash (`\`) character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个反斜杠 (`\`) 字符。

trans-unit.source: Match the character class that consists of the individual drive letters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配单个驱动器字母组成的字符类。

trans-unit.source: This match is the first captured subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 此匹配项是第一个捕获子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match the literal dollar sign (`$`) character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配文本的美元符号 (`$`) 字符。
